alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Laurens, Chester, southeastern York and southern Union Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of York to 13 miles west of Chester to 4 miles southwest of Union. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Union, Chester, Newport, Lesslie, Monarch Mill, Fort Lawn, Carlisle, Mcconnells and Richburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
